name: The Cool Notes
description: '''The Cool Notes''' were a British [[pop music|pop]]-[[funk]] [[musical ensemble|group]] who had a string of [[record chart|chart]] [[hit record|hits]] in the UK between 1984 and 1986. The band, which formed in [[South London]], consisted of seven members of both [[Vocals|vocal]] and [[musical instrument|instrumental]] talent. They are best known for their UK number 11 hit, "Spend the Night".
